scripts.test:db:prepare: if exist tests\generated\sqlite (rmdir /s /q tests\generated\sqlite) && prisma generate --schema=prisma/sqlite.schema.prisma && cross-env DATABASE_URL="file:./test.db" prisma db push --schema=prisma/sqlite.schema.prisma --force-reset --skip-generate
scripts.test: npm run test:db:prepare && cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --runInBand
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:db:prepare && cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --selectProjects unit --runInBand
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:db:prepare && cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --selectProjects integration --runInBand
scripts.test:explain: npm run test:db:prepare && cross-env NODE_ENV=test jest --selectProjects explain --runInBand
